text: Pen apɨs based kɨlop tɨtay gak anɨb okok, binɨb okok kɨlop yomek nɨŋɨd, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgel. Chɨn pen, lum awl gɨjunɨg ñɨn kɨdek ownɨgeb ñɨn ak mɨdobun okok, God chɨnop nɨŋɨd, kɨlop gos tɨmud wuken gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgel agɨl gos nɨgak. Gos anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop gek kesɨm anɨb okok buk Baybol mɨgan ayaŋ ñu kɨl tɨkɨlak.
